item.description:
@marcus_nunez wrote:

Ok if you do not know how to code just get off and close your server. It is not that hard to copy and paste. If you want something that might help. Get a slot machine tutorial. And code that into dicing with a few corrections. Errors tell you exactly where it is at. So go to that line by typing Ctrl+G. And type the line and delete or add something that looks suspicious.

OT:Very Nice Tutorial. Though it could be a bit more simpler. But other than that. Nicely Done!

item.title: (PI) Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:14, topic:407215”][quote author=Platinumsoul9 link=topic=508501.msg3690458#msg3690458 date=1312084741]
Im sorry im not as smart as you vmanly… i really am. But honestly i feel sorry for you. Because you think in such a violent way, you dont have to be a smart-ass year-round. One simple answer is all it takes. Think about how people see you. Not what they think of you.
[/quote]

Im-1
im-2
i-3
i-4
smart-ass-(not sure if it’s one word, but i’m counting it.)-5
year-round- 2 seperate words - 6.

You made 6 grammatical errors in that short paragraph. And I know you’re next response is going to be, “its teh interwebz!@! Y DO I CEAR ABOT GRAMER???”. Then i’ll respond, “You just said you’re as smart as me, then made 6 errors in 6 sentances…” . Now you’re going to think of something unpredictable to say so you sound smart.

Once I came to see if you responded to this yet, I realized I haven’t posted it yet… Boy do I feel dumb. And I realized that you’re probably only 12 or 13 years old who are trying to act like the internet guy that has so much knowledge of life and such. I’m done with this conversation now.

And one more thing before I press post, I told you to use google so that makes me a violent thinker? How do those 2 things go together?[/quote]

Owned

item.title: (PI) Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix1 Kryptix1
item.description:
@Kryptix1 wrote:

[quote=“Faded Vision, post:19, topic:407215”]retarded mistake here

and for shit like

[code]if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { //Dice 100
c.startAnimation(11900);
c.gfx0(2075);

c.sendMessage(“I have rolled a “+ Diceamount2 +” on the amount dice.”);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (itemId == 15086 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { //Dice 6
c.startAnimation(11900);
c.gfx0(2075);
c.sendMessage(“I have rolled a “+ Diceamount1 +” on the amount die.”);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (itemId == 15088 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { //Dice blackjack
c.startAnimation(11900);
c.gfx0(2075);
c.sendMessage(“I have rolled a “+ DiceamountB +” on the amount die.”);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
if (itemId == 15092 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { //Dice 10
c.startAnimation(11900);
c.gfx0(2075);
c.sendMessage(“I have rolled a “+ Diceamount3 +” on the amount die.”);
c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
}[/code]

can’t you just do

public void handleDice(int diceAmount) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { c.startAnimation(11900); c.gfx0(2075); c.sendMessage("I have rolled a " + diceAmount + " on the amount die."); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } }

So it’s

if (itemId == 15098) { // Dice handleDice(Diceamount2); } else if (itemId == 15086) { handleDice(Diceamount1); } else if (itemId == 15088) { handleDice(DiceamountB); } else if (itemId == 15092) { handleDice(Diceamount3); }

Btw the naming conventions on those ints are wrong…ew[/quote]

where would i place these clickitem.java?
